breakthroughPP.simpleIO

Class TextOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • breakthroughPP.simpleIO.TextOutput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Showable

    public class TextOutput
extends java.lang.Object
implements Showable
    Class to generate and visualise a textual visualization of the current board state

    Georg-August University Goettingen APP breakthroughPP SoSe 2016

    Author:
    Haseeb Sabar Anar

            throws VisualisationException
        Updates the output. This function shows an representation of the game board
        Specified by:
